formattedAddress: 652 Hudson St, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 652 Hudson St, New York, NY 10014, USA

originalText.text: I lived a very stressful life. Always on the run but the minute I walked into Sisley Maison I was on Zen mode. Great atmosphere enticing to take a step back and just relaxed.  All the employees always ready to help with a smile. I want to give a special thank you to Freddy my esthetician He gave me a wonderful facial. He was ready to listen to my concerns about my skin and gave me great advice how to continue to care for my face. By  the time I left I felt like a brand new person.  I will definitely go back.

text.text: I lived a very stressful life. Always on the run but the minute I walked into Sisley Maison I was on Zen mode. Great atmosphere enticing to take a step back and just relaxed. originalText.text: My first experience getting a facial at Sisley was the absolute best I’ve ever had, thanks to the lovely Natasha (10/10 highly recommend!). From the moment you step inside, everyone was very welcoming and made me feel at ease. The esthetician Natasha listened to my skin concerns during our consultation and guided me through steps on how to help my skin and was very knowledgeable and helpful. Will definitely be coming back just to see her!!

text.text: My first experience getting a facial at Sisley was the absolute best I’ve ever had, thanks to the lovely Natasha (10/10 highly recommend!). Will definitely be coming back just to see her!!

originalText.text: For my birthday, my sister treated us to a facials with Natasha and Phung. It was a wonderful experience, we had cupcakes, macarons and mimosas waiting for us before our facials. My esthetician Natasha, keeps my skin feeling hydrated and feeling great. I will definitely visit again.

text.text: For my birthday, my sister treated us to a facials with Natasha and Phung. It was a wonderful experience, we had cupcakes, macarons and mimosas waiting for us before our facials. My esthetician Natasha, keeps my skin feeling hydrated and feeling great. I will definitely visit again.

originalText.text:
Wow !
What an experience ! Thank you to the wonderful team at Sisley in their beautiful new location, absolutely stunning. When I entered the boutique I was greet by Sterling, he was amazing and welcoming - giving me a full tour and making me want to pamper myself. Once I spoke with Natasha, I knew I wanted a facial same-day and she worked wonders on my skin, an amazing experience with amazing results! Wonderful team and wonderful experience!!

text.text:
Wow !
What an experience ! Thank you to the wonderful team at Sisley in their beautiful new location, absolutely stunning. When I entered the boutique I was greet by Sterling, he was amazing and welcoming - giving me a full tour and making me want to pamper myself. Once I spoke with Natasha, I knew I wanted a facial same-day and she worked wonders on my skin, an amazing experience with amazing results! Wonderful team and wonderful experience!!

originalText.text: This was my first ever facial and it was such an amazing experience, thanks to Alex. She is so passionate about her work. She really tries to grasp every concern you have for your skin. She explains in detail why it’s probably happening and, what’s best to help the issue. She has such a gentle and careful touch. She explained the whole process. She was so informative and helpful when recommending what was best for my skin after giving it a close look. After Alex completed my facial, I felt so hydrated, relaxed  and refreshed. All the staff there are sweet hearts. They always asked if I needed anything, they offered sweet treats and drinks. Definitely will come back to see Alex, and would highly recommend to everyone I know.
